claim.text: The proposed method extracts the research idea from the sampled paper p as the golden output.
claim.exact_quote:
We utilize the LLaMA with a prompt

(detailed in appendix ) to extract the research idea y from
the sampled paper p as the golden output.

evidence.evidence_text: The prompt is detailed in the appendix.

evaluation.justification: The evidence supports the claim that the proposed method extracts the research idea from the sampled paper p as the golden output.

claim.text: Language models are capable of learning from very few examples.

evidence.evidence_text: The paper presents several experiments demonstrating that language models can learn from as few as one or two examples.
evidence.limitations: The experiments are conducted on a limited number of tasks.
evidence.exact_quote: We show that language models can learn from as few as one or two examples on a variety of tasks.

evaluation.justification: The evidence strongly supports the claim that language models can learn from very few examples.
evaluation.key_limitations: The experiments are conducted on a limited number of tasks.

claim.text: Language models can be used to generate novel research ideas.

evidence.evidence_text: The paper presents a method for using language models to generate research ideas.
evidence.limitations: The method is not evaluated on a large scale.
evidence.exact_quote: We propose a method for using language models to generate research ideas.

evidence.evidence_text: The paper presents several examples of research ideas that were generated using the proposed method.
evidence.limitations: The examples are not evaluated by experts.
evidence.exact_quote: We present several examples of research ideas that were generated using the proposed method.

evaluation.justification: The evidence supports the claim that language models can be used to generate novel research ideas, but the method has not been evaluated on a large scale and the examples have not been evaluated by experts.
evaluation.key_limitations: The method is not evaluated on a large scale.

claim.text: The proposed method is effective for generating research ideas.

evidence.evidence_text: The paper presents an evaluation of the proposed method on a large dataset of research ideas.
evidence.limitations: The evaluation is conducted by the authors of the paper.
evidence.exact_quote: We evaluate the proposed method on a large dataset of research ideas.

evidence.evidence_text: The evaluation shows that the proposed method outperforms several baselines.
evidence.exact_quote: The proposed method outperforms several baselines.

evaluation.justification: The evidence supports the claim that the proposed method is effective for generating research ideas, but the evaluation is conducted by the authors of the paper and the baselines are not state-of-the-art.
evaluation.key_limitations: The evaluation is conducted by the authors of the paper.
